1000.name: ErrGetLatestReleasesCode
1000.long_description: Unable to get the latest release info from the GithubAPI

1002.name: ErrOpInvalidCode
1002.long_description: Kuma adapter received an invalid operation from the meshey server
1002.probable_cause:
The operation is not supported by the adapter
Invalid operation name
1002.suggested_remediation: Check if the operation name is valid and supported by the adapter

1003.name: ErrInstallKumaCode
1003.long_description: Error occurred while installing kuma mesh through kumactl

1004.name: ErrMeshConfigCode
1004.long_description: Error getting MeshSpecKey config from in-memory configuration
1004.suggested_remediation: Reconnect the adapter to the Meshery Server

1005.name: ErrFetchManifestCode
1005.short_description: Error occurred while fetching the manifest

1006.name: ErrClientConfigCode
1006.short_description: Error occurred while setting client config

1009.name: ErrSampleAppCode
1009.long_description: Error occurred while trying to install a sample application using manifests
1009.suggested_remediation: Reconnect your adapter to Meshery Server to refresh the kubeclient

1010.name: ErrGetKumactlCode
1010.long_description: Error occurred while downloading`kumactl` and moving it to .meshery/bin]

1011.name: ErrDownloadBinaryCode
1011.long_description: Error occurred while download kuma binary from its release url

1012.name: ErrInstallBinaryCode
1012.long_description: Error occurred while installing kuma mesh through kumactl

1014.name: ErrUntarDefaultCode
1014.long_description: Error occurred in the process of untaring a compressed file
1014.probable_cause: The compressed file might be corrupted
1014.suggested_remediation: Clear the cache and retry the operation

1015.name: ErrMoveBinaryCode
1015.short_description: Error occurred while moving the kumactl binary
1015.probable_cause: Meshery adapter might not have write access

1016.name: ErrCustomOperationCode
1016.long_description: Error occurred while applying custom manifest to the cluster
1016.suggested_remediation: Reupload the kubconfig in the Meshery Server and reconnect the adapter

1017.name: ErrNilClientCode
1017.suggested_remediation: Reconnect the adapter to Meshery Server

1018.name: ErrApplyHelmChartCode
1018.long_description: Error occurred while applying Helm Chart

1019.name: ErrGetLatestReleaseCode
1019.probable_cause: Latest version could not be found at the specified url

1024.name: ErrParseKumaCoreComponentCode
1024.short_description: kuma core component manifest parsing failing

1025.name: ErrParseOAMComponentCode
1025.long_description: Error occurred while parsing application component in the OAM request made by Meshery server
1025.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall configuration component received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Component struct
1025.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid component for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also check if Meshery Server and adapters are referring to same component struct provided in MeshKit.

1026.name: ErrParseOAMConfigCode
1026.long_description: Error occurred while parsing configuration in the request made by Meshery Server
1026.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall OAM config received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Config struct
1026.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid config for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also, confirm that Meshery Server and Adapters are referring to same config struct provided in MeshKit

1028.name: ErrLoadNamespaceCode
1028.probable_cause: Trying to access a namespace which is not available
1028.suggested_remediation: Verify presence of namespace. Confirm Meshery ServiceAccount permissions
